name: Bucks Bunny
description:
Bucks Bunny

As the new heir of the family bunny breeding business, you must manage your kennel on a remote island in Australia.

Breed your rabbits to sell them, tame the wild exotic species that populate this island and don't let the bandicoots eat all your crops.

Bucks Bunny is a mellow ambient game that can either be played competitively or contemplatively, whether you aim for a high score or a dynamic screen saver.

Controls :

  •  WASD / ZQSD (toggle option) : Movement
  •  E : Craft Fences
  •  Q / A : Drop / Sell
  •  Left Click : Pick up / Break
  •  Right Click : Place / Repair
  •  Tab : Open Map

Music from The Joy Drops - Widow's Plea For Her Son and On a Desert Isle - C.W. Stoneking. Cover by Nelson Walkom

Made by H&T in 72h with help from L&ML
